summary: This is a brief email exchange from December 12, 2007, regarding an indictment package on Jeffrey Epstein. One person asks another if they want the package sent, and the recipient declines, stating they already have it.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein indictment package
events.description: An email exchange occurs where one person offers to send an indictment package on Jeffrey Epstein to another, who declines, stating they already have it.

keyFacts: An indictment package on Jeffrey Epstein existed and was being discussed via email on December 12, 2007.
The recipient of the email already possessed the indictment package, declining an offer to have it sent.
The correspondence is brief and sent from a BlackBerry wireless handheld device.
